headline: William Blair Retains Buy Rating on EPAM Systems Following Q2 FY2025 Results
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) is one of the Best Affordable AI Stocks to Buy. On August 7, William Blair retained its Buy rating on EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM), with no price target on the stock. Maggie Nolan from William Blair kept her Buy rating on EPAM following strong Q2 FY2025 financial performance and strategic initiatives. […]
